skills.title: Full-Stack
skills.description: Professionally skilled in both front-end and back-end development, I excel in creating seamless, user-friendly web applications with a strong focus on performance and functionality.

skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Front-end development involves creating the user interface of web applications. React, a JavaScript-based library, enables interactive and dynamic user experiences. CSS determines the styles and layouts.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Proficient in Java-based backend development, I leverage Hibernate and Spring Boot to optimize database operations, enhance security, and maximize performance.

skills.title: PL/SQL Developer
skills.description: Advanced proficiency in Oracle PL/SQL. Expertise includes complex query optimization, stored procedures, and database performance tuning for seamless backend operations in enterprise-level applications.

portfolio.title: Movies App
portfolio.description: Explore a vast collection of the latest releases, timeless classics, and exclusive content, all in one convenient app experience.

portfolio.title: Movie Search
portfolio.description: Explore the latest releases and timeless classics! A vast movie collection awaits for an amazing film experience.

portfolio.title: Todo App
portfolio.description: Boost productivity with a user-friendly to-do app. Organize your tasks effortlessly. Always ready, accessible anywhere. Get things done efficiently!

portfolio.title: Shopping-cart web site
portfolio.description: Effortless shopping experience: React site offers secure payments, personalized recommendations, and smooth browsing.

portfolio.title: Product-Filter-Search web site
portfolio.description: A product filtering and search website developed with JavaScript. User-friendly interface for a fast and efficient product browsing experience.

portfolio.title: Library Management Backend Project
portfolio.description: Efficient Spring Boot backend for seamless library management. Streamline operations, manage resources, and enhance user experience.

portfolio.title: Starlink clone web site
portfolio.description: Starlink Clone website built with CSS. Elevate your internet speed with unique design and user-friendly interface.

portfolio.title: Company Backend Project
portfolio.description: Efficient Spring Boot backend for seamless company operations. Streamline processes, boost productivity, and enhance functionality.

portfolio.title: To do Backend Project
portfolio.description: Java-powered to-do project streamlines tasks, enhancing productivity and organization for optimized workflow efficiency.
